title: Service Request Management procedures
content:
Service Request Management is the primary point of contact for users when:

  • There is a service disruption request for support, or
  • There is a need to request an offering item.

It's also a communication point for users and a coordination point for multiple IT groups and processes. In this module, service request personnel create, classify, analyze, escalate, monitor, and fulfill service requests.

Related topics

  • How to create a request record
  • How to edit a request record
  • How to create a record from a request
  • How to deal with a Live Support call
  • How to use the chat capability
